subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Angela Stanford shot her second straight five-under-par 67 to take a four-stroke lead at the Bell Micro LPGA Classic in Mobile, Ala. Stanford had seven birdies, including four in a row on the back nine, to reach 12-under 204.
snippet: Angela Stanford shot her second straight five-under-par 67 to take a four-stroke lead at the Bell Micro LPGA Classic in Mobile, Ala. Stanford had seven birdies, including four in a row on the back nine, to reach 12-under 204.
